content.metadata: Open a web browser and visit the OrangeHRM login page by entering the URL 'https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login' in the address bar.
On the OrangeHRM login page, locate and click on the 'Username' input field to prepare for entering credentials.

event.label: Username

content.metadata: After successfully logging in, locate and click on the 'My Info' link in the left-hand navigation menu.

event.label: My Info

content.description: Click on Include Employment Contract Details
content.metadata: Locate the 'Include Employment Contract Details' toggle switch and click on it to enable the contract details section.

event.label: Include Employment Contract Details

locator.xpath: #app > div.oxd-layout.orangehrm-upgrade-layout:nth-of-type(1) > div.oxd-layout-container:nth-of-type(2) > div.oxd-layout-context:nth-of-type(2) > div.orangehrm-background-container > div.orangehrm-card-container > div.orangehrm-edit-employee > div.orangehrm-edit-employee-content:nth-of-type(2) > div.orangehrm-horizontal-padding.orangehrm-vertical-padding:nth-of-type(1) > form.oxd-form > div.oxd-form-row.user-form-header:nth-of-type(2) > div.oxd-switch-wrapper > label > span.oxd-switch-input.oxd-switch-input--active.--label-right

content.metadata: Observe the 'Include Employment Contract Details' toggle switch to confirm it has changed to an 'enabled' or 'checked' state, and the associated input fields for contract details (e.g., Contract Start Date, Contract End Date, Contract Details upload) become visible.
